short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn text blocks into a fun typing game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform any webpage into an action-packed typing game! 

Perfect to help improve typing skills, or simply to pass the time and have some fun when you're taking a break from studying. 

Features:
Engaging Gameplay: Turn the text on any website into a thrilling typing game. Words fall from the top of the screen, and you must type them correctly to score points and keep them from reaching the bottom.

Dynamic Difficulty: Choose from three difficulty levels – Easy, Intermediate, and Hard – to match your typing skills and challenge yourself.

Score and High Score Tracking: Keep track of your progress with real-time scoring and try to beat your high score!

Download Text Invaders today and turn every webpage into an exciting typing adventure!
